user_story: As a user, I want to search products by name or category so that I can easily find the items I'm interested in purchasing.
generated_ac:
1. The system shall allow users to search for products by entering a product name.
2. The system shall allow users to search for products by selecting a product category.
3. The system shall display a list of products that match the entered name or selected category.
4. The system shall display a message to the user when no products are found for the submitted search criteria.
edited_ac:
